item.title: [ Leetcode 841 ] Keys and Rooms | Solution Approach & Explanation
item.description: There are n rooms labeled from 0 to n-1. Each rooms[i] contains a list of keys that can be used to unlock other rooms. Initially, you start in room 0, which is already unlocked. The goal is to determine whether you can visit all rooms. LinkðŸ”—ï¼šhttps://leetcode.com/problems/keys-and-rooms/ Solution - DFS This problem can be solved using Depth-First Search (DFS), as it is essentially a graph traversal problem. The rooms and their keys form a directed graph, where a key in rooms[i] represents an edge from room i to another room.
